text: or , is a mythical Japanese dragon with eight heads and eight tails.日本書紀 卷第一, 頭尾各有八岐古事記 上卷并序, 身一有八頭八尾 == In popular culture == Yamata Amasung Keibu Keioiba () is a Meitei language play that interweaves the stories of the two legendary creatures, Yamata-no-Orochi of Japanese mythology and Keibu Keioiba of Meitei mythology (Manipuri mythology). In the play, the role of Yamata-no-Orochi was played by Maisnam Momocha. ==References== Category:Japanese mythology Category:Dragons
title: Yamata-no-Orochi
